SQL.LOAD: SELECT afa_invoice_rate_id, risk_fee, spm_coe, fullfillment_notification, marketing_expenses, premium_taxes, loss_reserve_cost, overhead, general_expenses, assessments, lae, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, afa_reporting_rate_id FROM elita.elp_afa_reporting_rates WHERE afa_reporting_rate_id = :afa_reporting_rate_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elita.elp_afa_reporting_rates SET afa_invoice_rate_id = :afa_invoice_rate_id, risk_fee = :risk_fee, spm_coe = :spm_coe, fullfillment_notification = :fullfillment_notification, marketing_expenses = :marketing_expenses, premium_taxes = :premium_taxes, loss_reserve_cost = :loss_reserve_cost, overhead = :overhead, general_expenses = :general_expenses, assessments = :assessments, lae = :lae, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE afa_reporting_rate_id = :afa_reporting_rate_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elita.elp_afa_reporting_rates ( afa_invoice_rate_id, risk_fee, spm_coe, fullfillment_notification, marketing_expenses, premium_taxes, loss_reserve_cost, overhead, general_expenses, assessments, lae, created_by, afa_reporting_rate_id ) VALUES ( :afa_invoice_rate_id, :risk_fee, :spm_coe, :fullfillment_notification, :marketing_expenses, :premium_taxes, :loss_reserve_cost, :overhead, :general_expenses, :assessments, :lae, :created_by, :afa_reporting_rate_id )
